import Sidebar from './Sidebar' import Content from './Content' import Title from './Title' import { useState } from 'react' const Main = () => { const [page, setPage] = useState("This text will be state controlled!") const changeContent = (content) => { setPage(content) } return (
</div> <div className='row'> <Sidebar update={changeContent} /> <Content page={page} /> </div> </div> </div> ) } export default Main
